1232.content:
Our story begins far to the north of Konoha; about a week’s travel. Kiba Inuzuka and Naruto Uzumaki are joined by two other shinobi as they explore a dense forest seemingly in the middle of nowhere.

“Are you sure this is the right place?” Kiba asked as he crouched down by a tree stump and examined several mushrooms. “I’m not seeing any plants like the one we described to you.”

“I’m positive! The merchants that spoke of it described this area precisely.” replied Daiki, a man who looked to be somewhere in his early 20s. He was large and muscular and a jōnin of the Hidden Tree Village; a relatively new village that had sprung up nearby within the past few months. The village wasn’t very strong and lacked promising ninja, but when two young men of Konoha had come to them seeking a particular medical herb, Daiki and his brother had been too eager to assist. Well…Daiki at least…

“And they just happened to be out of stock at the time.” mumbled Kenta, the other Tree ninja and younger brother of Daiki. He looked to be around Naruto and Kiba’s age and sported bushy brown hair and an unzipped ninja coat. While he wasn’t as bulky as his bro, he wasn’t afraid to show off his toned and athletic torso to all the ladies of the village. “This is a waste of time. We’ve been searching for over an hour now…that’s an hour I could have spent perfecting my shuriken jutsu!”

“Quiet, Kenta!” shouted the older male. “Naruto and Kiba sought our help and it’s our duty to aid them in healing their comrade! If we help save their friend, surely the Leaf Village will come to respect us!”

“Haha…by the way, you should know…” Naruto chuckled nervously as he scratched the back of his head. “This ‘comrade’ of ours…is actually just a dog.”

“A…dog?” repeated Kenta, giving the spiky-haired blond a look that said “are you kidding me?”.

“That dog is my comrade and dear friend!” Kiba snapped at Naruto as he clenched one of his fists. “A friend that was badly poisoned thanks to <i>someone’s</i> stupidity.”

“Are you still angry about that?” Naruto asked as he narrowed his blue eyes at the brown-haired shinobi. “That wasn’t my fault! Plus, didn’t Granny Tsunade say he’d eventually get better in a month or two? There was no need to go on this pointless journey…”

“Like I was gonna leave Akamaru to suffer for that long! We’re finding that damned flower and then we’re returning to Konoha ASAP!” shouted Kiba before he turned his back to Naruto and stomped deeper into the forest. “I saw a hill a ways back; I’m gonna go check around it. You three keep searching this area.” As Kiba disappeared from sight, Kenta clenched his fists and shouted back at the dog tamer.

“Hey! Don’t order us around, Leaf brat!” Kiba must have heard him, but he gave no reply and that just ticked the teenager off more

“Now, now, Kenta. Less screaming, more searching.” scolded Daiki as the three of them continued to search for the plant that would cure Akamaru.

~~~~~~~~~

Several minutes later, no one was having any luck. Kenta was about to open his mouth and suggest they head back when…

“Hey, look at that!” Naruto exclaimed as he pointed at a strange cave poking out of the ground. The trio of shinobi approached the cavern and gazed down into a darkness leading underground.

“Ah, this is it!” Daiki announced as he leaned down and plucked a small, rose-like flower from just outside the cave’s entrance. It definitely looked like a rose, but it was blue in color and lacked any thorns. “This is what we’re looking for! The Tengu’s Tongue!”

“Hmmm…Akamaru’s a pretty big pooch; it’s gonna take more than that little flower to heal him.” explained Naruto; earning a nod from Daiki in response.

“In that case let us venture into this cave! I’m sure we’ll find more inside!” the jōnin urged his younger companions to follow him as they made their way into the dark cavern. After traversing a few yards into the earth, the ninja noticed something odd. The tunnel was growing brighter as lit candles appeared on the walls.

“Someone’s living down here…” Kenta mumbled the obvious as he looked around them suspiciously.

“Yeah…keep your guard up.” Naruto whispered from just behind Kenta. Moments later the three emerged into the cave’s main chamber and were shocked by what they saw. The underground room had been transformed into some sort of laboratory. Shelves of tomes and scrolls lined the walls, many candles and lanterns lit the place up, and several vials of strange liquid was boiling and bubbling on a nearby stove. Naruto grimaced as he fanned the pungent odor away from his face. “Ugh…what is this place? It’s giving me the creeps…reminds me of Orochimaru’s hideout.”

“How do you know Orochimaru-sama?!” came a sudden voice from the darkness. Naruto and the two Tree brothers got into fighting stances as a man appeared from the shadows. He looked like a young man in his late teens and was wearing a white lab coat and goggles over his eyes. His hair was black and tied in a ponytail and Naruto noticed a Sound headband around his waist. “Are you also servants of his? Has Orochimaru-sama finally sent someone to observe the fruits of my most recent experiments?!” The young man smiled gleefully and looked like he’d jump for joy on the spot.

“Um…hate to break it to you, guy, but Orochimaru is dead.” said Naruto, receiving a look of disbelief from the Sound ninja.

“What?! There’s no way! You’re lying!” The black-haired scientist lifted up his goggles to reveal two blue eyes. Those eyes glared at the trio hatefully as he realized their headbands were not of the Sound! “I see now. You’re not allies, but enemies! In that case…” The man smirked and placed his gloved hands together. “I’ll destroy you using my newest jutsu! Prepare to die, scum!”

12321.content:
“Hehe, now this is what I’m talking about!” Kenta said with a grin as he reached for his shuriken pouch. “I thought this little trip into the forest would be nothing but boredom, but I’ve found some action! Get ready, loser, because you’re the first Sound ninja I’m gonna bring down!”

“Wait, Kenta! I’ll attack first; you back me up!” stated Daiki as he charged toward the nameless ninja like a bull. The Sound shinobi didn’t even bother to avoid the attack as he quickly made several hand seals.

“Size Reduction Wave!”

Daiki cursed under his breath as the ninja released his jutsu. A visible wave of high-pitched sound radiated off his hands and tore through the bodies of the three shinobi. Daiki was stopped in his tracks and covered his ears in agony. Naruto and Kenta did the same; they felt like the sound waves were gonna made their bodies burst!

“Ugh…it’s rebounding off the walls!” Naruto shouted, though no one could hear his voice. His vision was getting blurry and he began getting dizzy and disoriented. “I’ve gotta…get outside!” Naruto turned to dash back into the tunnel leading to this underground room, but he only took a couple steps before he tripped over something and landed flat on his face. “Ow! What the fuck?” Naruto rubbed his nose and looked behind him. He had tripped over a large rock about ¼ his size. “That…wasn’t there before. How did…?” Naruto rubbed his eyes and looked up and around. What he saw made his azure orbs widen and his jaw drop in utter shock. The ceiling of the cave looked like it was miles above him…the furniture and dropped books looked humungous now! The fox boy looked back at Kenta and saw he was in a similar state.

“N-No way…” The brown-haired teenager gulped as he glanced around at his surroundings. “ Is this some kind of genjutsu? He couldn’t really have…shrunk us! This is crazy!” The young ninja looked down at his palms. “We’re the size of ants!! We’re…we’re…” Kenta trailed off when he saw something that sent and even colder chill down his spine. He let out a shriek and Naruto quickly looked at what had spooked him. The Sound scientist, how a titanic giant to them, was standing over Kenta’s brother with one foot raised into the air.

“Goodbye, BUG.” said the giant to the tiny jōnin as he licked his lips. Daiki’s eyes trembled with fear under the shadow of the titan’s sandal, but he quickly shook his head and returned to his senses. Unfortunately, he only had seconds left to spend.

“KENTA! GET OUT OF H-“ Before he could finish, the Sound ninja stomped down on him and an audible crunch was heard. Tears streamed down Kenta’s cheeks as he collapsed to his knees.

“Hahaha, wow! That felt awesome!” said the teenage scientist as he swiveled his foot into the cave’s cold, rocky floor. “I just crushed another person like a bug! I feel so strong…stronger than a Kage!”

“No…Daiki…” Naruto clenched his teeth and fists as he looked away. He quickly realized they were still in danger, however, and looked back at the surviving brother. “Kenta! We have to get out of here! Get up!”

“Dai…ki…” Kenta mumbled as he just knelt there; frozen in horror. Their giant attacker noticed Kenta next and smirked down at him.

“You’re next, buggy.” he blurted out as he stomped toward the younger male. Kenta couldn’t move a muscle as he just stared up at the approaching figure. He held back the urge to vomit as he noticed a splotch of pasty red residue imbedded into the giant’s trends. Naruto didn’t know what to do…if he just rushed in there to save Kenta, they would both be crushed! He had to think of something…something in the next few seconds!

“Hey you!!!” called a new voice; its loudness echoing throughout the cave. Naruto and Kenta looked back just as two huge, black-sandaled feet almost stepped on them. The footfalls carried enough force to send both teens hurtling a few inches backwards. When the scientist looked up, it was just in time to receive a fist to the face. The blow broke his nose and sent him flying into a rock wall. After smacking into it the shinobi slumped to the ground unconscious and with a stupid look on his face. “I knew I smelled something weird. What’s a Sound ninja doing here…and where are Naruto and the others?” Kiba glanced around the room, but saw no sign of anyone else. He swore he followed their scent down here. “Well…better take care of you. I’ll just tie you up and report you to the Tree village.” Kiba reached into his pouch and took out some wire as he approached the fallen scientist. Meanwhile, Naruto grumbled as he picked himself off the floor and dusted off his pants.”

“That was a close one, but he needs to watch where he’s going!” Naruto remarked as he approached Kenta. The young Tree ninja was standing up as well and wiping tears from his face. “Hey, Kenta!” The whiskered teen frowned as he put a hand on the teen’s shoulder. “Sorry about your brother…but we have more important things to worry about!” The blond pointed over at Kiba as the giant brunet was busy tying up the Sound ninja’s limbs. “Kiba may have saved us, but I don’t think he’s noticed us yet. We need to get his attention before we wind up like Daiki!”

“Yeah…I know.” Kenta sniffed loudly and looked up at Kiba. “I’m not gonna die like that! I became a ninja to lead the Tree village to glory, not get stepped on like a roach! I wanna get back to normal size so I can finish off that Sound ninja scum!” With that said, Kenta was done crying and charged toward Kiba and his fallen opponent.

“Hey, hold on! Damn it, does this guy have any experience at all?!” Naruto hurried after the reckless male, but kept his eyes on Kiba. He was a comrade, but right now also a great danger…

123212.content:
"That should do it..." Kiba remarked as he finished tying up the Sound shinobi. "Now... I wonder where Naruto and the others are..." Kiba pondered as he scratched his chin in thought. Kenta, still a bit distressed, screamed at the giant brunet. "We're down here, you giant idiot!! Daiki got killed, help us!!" Kenta screamed at the top of his lungs, as he headed for Kiba's giant black sandals.

"Huh? Kenta...?" Kiba looked around, being sure he had heard Kenta's voice just now. Kenta was just about to jump on Kiba's sandal, when Naruto grabbed him by his shoulder and pulled him back. "Are you crazy?!" Naruto asked as he pulled Kenta away from Kiba's massive form. "What are you doing?! He was just about to notice us!! Let me go!" Kenta struggled, as Naruto wouldn't let go.

"Is that the gratitude I get for saving your life? You can't just charge in like that! You'll get stomped if you aren't careful!" Naruto warned. Kenta looked at the giant Kiba and then at the red spot on the floor that used to be his brother. "He would've said the same if he was here now..." Kenta replied with a vague smirk of regret. "Fine! Then I'll climb on the wall! He'll see me then!" Kenta assured. "No, no, no!! He...he mustn't see us!!" Naruto gulped. "Huh? Why?" Kenta looked at Naruto dumbfounded. "Eh... well.... we're small, and... and there's no telling what he might do to us!" Naruto remarked in a sly way. "What are you talking about?! He's our comrade, and he'll help us! If there's any hope, it's him! Besides, there's no reason for him to do that... right?" Kenta looked serious.

Naruto laughed nerviously and rubbed the back of his head. "Are you hiding something from me?" Kenta asked. "Well, the thing is... Akamaru got hurt... and... eh...." Naruto couldn't finish, as Kenta stared at him intensely. "Say, we know we're looking for medicine for his dog... but we never found out what exactly happened! Don't tell me that YOU....!" Kenta stared at the blond. "No!! It was an accident! I didn't mean to injure him..." Naruto muttered. "Well at least you apologized, right? There's nothing to worry about!" Kenta said again. "Well... actually... I didn't aplogize... hey, it's not my fault Akamaru jumps around everywhere and I can't get some space to train! And yeah... that's pretty much the reason why he dragged ME along..." Naruto folded his arms. "Then you've already made it up to him by going with him..." Kenta replied. "Yeah, I guess, but... even so, I've done some pranks on him and---" Naruto couldn't finish as Kenta interrupted. "Ugh, I don't wanna hear. Fine, if you're afraid to show yourself like this, then I won't tell him about you being like me. I'm going now..." Kenta said as he darted off. "Hey, I'm not afraid of Kiba!! I just don't like this situation..." Naruto nerviously remarked.

In the meantime, Kiba was just about to get going. "I have to find the others!" Kiba thought to himself as he looked around again. Kenta had just managed to reach Kiba from behind, as he yelled again. "Down here, Kiba! Down here!!"
"Kenta! Where are you?" Kiba thought he heard a faint squeal as he turned back. He looked around, but didn't see anyone. "Damn, I must be going nuts." Kiba scratched his head. Just as he pondered, he felt a tiny squish under his foot, as if he had stepped on something. Kiba looked down, and lifted his foot. Beneath it, he witnessed a red stain and a few unrecognizable limbs. "Yuck!! A bug with red blood? This place is filled with all kinds of creepy stuff!" Kiba shuddered, as he scraped his sandal against the floor. From across the small distance there was between Kiba and the tiny Naruto, Naruto saw the whole thing. "Damn it!!" Naruto cursed as he clenched his fists in anger. "I should've gone with him!!" Naruto hissed as he punched the ground.

"Well, I've wasted enough time already, I guess. It's a good thing I know Naruto's scent, so I can find him and the others." Kiba sighed as he formed a handseal and focused chakra in his nose. After a bit of sniffing, Kiba looked around again. "That's weird. I can smell Naruto around here, but I don't see him. And the scent is so small..." Kiba sniffed again, as he began to stomp in Naruto's direction. "Crap! He's gonna sniff me out!! And there's nowhere to hide!!" Naruto stiffened. Kiba's powerful stomps almost made Naruto lose his balance, but he managed to keep it just barely. Naruto soon found himself face-to-sandal with... Kiba's massive sandal, which had stepped just infront of him... so close, that Kiba's large toes which were hanging a bit from his sandal were right in Naruto's face. Naruto grimaced, as the bad smell overcame him. The smell was so powerful, it made Naruto's face turn green, but he refused to move an inch, because if he did, Kiba would surely see him. Pinching his nose, Naruto looked up at the looming Kiba, and he felt his heart skip a beat at what he saw. Kiba was looking right down at him... with a smirk.

"Well, well... how did you get in such a predicament, Naruto?" Kiba asked, barely supressing his laughter. Naruto tried to respond, but he just coughed because of the smell coming from Kiba's big toes. Kiba laughed a bit, as he bent down, and quickly scooped the shrunken Naruto in his fist. Naruto could finally take a deep breath of fresh air, but before either of them could speak, cackling was heard across the room. "You'll never get this lab's secrets..." the Sound shinobi had recovered. "Crap!" Kiba cursed as he turned back and saw the Sound nin make a single handsign, despite the wire. The whole room lit up in bright light, as paper bombs appeared all over the place. Reacting quickly, Kiba focused chakra to his feet, and dashed for the exit as fast as he could. The Sound nin's maniacal laughter could be heard, as Kiba got out of the cavern just in time, before it detonated. Kiba had just enough time to put the shrunken Naruto into his pocket, before the shock wave blast off and sent him flying a couple of meters away from the collapsing cavern. When the ash and dust finally cleared, there were no remnants of the cavern. The blast had been set up, so that it would erase all traces of the hideout.

"Ugh... damn, that was a bit extreme even for me." Kiba rubbed his head, and cleared some dust off himself as he got up. After he had recovered, he pulled Naruto out of his pocket. "You alright?" Kiba asked, slightly worried. "Ugh... yeah, I think so." Naruto mumbled as he held his head. "So what happened? How did you get so tiny?" Kiba asked, as he looked at the Naruto in his fist. Naruto took a deep breath, and explained everything that had happened since he left to look for the medicine.

Kiba's eyes widened with disbelief as he got told what happened to Daiki, and how he had stepped on Kenta. "Damn! This is all your fault, Naruto! If you hadn't injured Akamaru in my previous mission, this wouldn't have happened!!" Kiba barked out. "What?! I wasn't the one who stepped on Kenta! You were!!" Naruto protested. Kiba took a deep breath, and tried to calm himself down. "Let's... let's just not talk about this anymore, alright?" Kiba suggested. Naruto looked to the side, and nodded. "At least we got the medicine..." Kiba remarked, as he put Naruto on top of his head, and walked off deeper into the forest.

==================================

A couple of hours had passed, and Kiba had reached his limit. "Let's take a rest here." Kiba said as he sat down, and leaned against a tree. Even though he had walked for a few hours, they were still in the boundaries of the unknown forest. "What? You're tired already?! Come on! I think there are some Hot Springs not too far away from here!" Naruto protested again. "Yeah, I know, but I'm too tired of all this walking. We walked far away from Konoha, then I was looking for the medicine all day, then I rushed to the cavern, then I had to rush out to escape from gettin' blown to bits, and then I had to walk a few miles. You wouldn't have even lasted half as long as me!" Kiba pridefully remarked. Naruto didn't reply, and just jumped off of Kiba's head down to the ground. "C'mon, Kiba!! Let's go!!" Naruto insisted as he began to walk off. "My feet are aching so bad..." Kiba lamented. "Oh yeah! That reminds me! Your feet stink, Kiba! When was the last time you washed them?! If your toes smelled so bad, I don't even want to imagine what your whole foot smells like!" Naruto complained. "I bet it's not any worse than your farts, that I had to smell so many times!! Even if it is worse, it would teach you lesson about farting in my face!" Kiba laughed. "Hah! If I was normal sized, I wouldn't hesitate to fart on you right now! You sure as hell deserve it, Kiba!" Naruto said, pointing at Kiba.

" Hmm... if he doesn't show any respect, then why should I?! There's no point in arguing with him. Maybe I should just teach him a lesson about bad stench... and get payback too! If he's shrunken to a tiny size like that, I could take advantage and force him to smell my feet and he can't do anything about it! Yeah, why not...! Kiba thought as he looked at the zipper on his right sandal, and then at the shrunken Naruto. "What's with that smirk?" Naruto asked as he noticed Kiba staring at him with an evil smirk.

1232121.content:
“This smirk?” Kiba questioned as he widened his grin. “Nothing at all…just thinking of something funny.”

“Hmph.” Naruto scoffed and turned back to continue walking. After taking just a few steps, the blond turned back to see Kiba still hadn’t budged an inch. In fact, the giant brunet was now unzipping his right sandal and taking it off! “I’m serious, Kiba! Let’s get going! I can stand being this small for another minute!”

“What’s the rush?” Kiba replied without even look at the shrunken shinobi; his eyes were glued to his own foot as he peeled his black sandal from it. “It’s going to take us a few days to reach Konoha anyway. You’re stuck like that for a while whether you like it or not.”

“Grrrr.” Naruto clenched his fists as he scowled at the giant ninja as he relaxed against a tree and rubbed his own foot in his hands. “Well why do you have to take your sandals off?! I think I can smell your nasty feet all the way over here!”

“Didn’t you hear me say my feet are aching?” the chūnin said with a smirk as he started taking off his left sandal as well. “You must have…my voice must be booming to a shortstack like you!”

“S-Shut up!” Naruto shouted as he looked toward the ground and mumbled. “It’s not that loud…in fact it’s a pretty girly voice, you know that?!”

Hearing this made Kiba’s mouth twitch. This little punk was gonna regret saying that. There were a few moments of silence before Naruto finally accepted that Kiba wasn’t going to move, so the small genin gave up and proceeded to return to Kiba’s side. As soon as the spiky-haired, bug-sized ninja was within Kiba’s reach, the dog ninja raised his right foot into the air and brought it down upon Naruto.

“What the fuck?!” Naruto cried out in surprise as he kicked off the ground and leaped out of the way of the descending appendage. He just managed to clear the foot’s shadow as it pressed into the ground he was just standing on; flattening the grass there. Naruto shuddered with slight fear as he sat just next to the bare foot. He craned his neck and glared angrily up at the foot’s owner. “What’s the big idea, mutt?! You almost stepped on me!!” Kiba didn’t respond to Naruto’s outburst. Instead the smirking teenager turned his foot onto its side so Naruto had a nice view of the flat, expansive sole. Kiba flexed his toes with anticipation before speaking again.

“Sniff it, bug boy.” spoke Kiba; his voice taking on a commanding and intimidating tone. Naruto’s sapphire-blue eyes widened in shock as gazed upon Kiba’s sole; fresh droplets of sweat rolling down its damp surface.

“Are you joking?! Why the hell would I do something as gross as that?!”

“Because…” Kiba began, and before he finished he brought his other foot closer to Naruto’s back. The fox boy had no idea what hit him until Kiba’s other sole was pushing his body into the first. “…I told you to. This is payback…and a little lesson in respect!” Kiba chuckled triumphantly as he gently rubbed Naruto’s shrunken form into his sweaty foot. The blond demon host screamed and shouted muffled curses as Kiba’s massive feet easily overpowered him. After several seconds Kiba parted his feet and snorted out a laugh when he saw the smaller male glued face-first into his sole. Naruto growled with frustration as he pushed against the giant’s foot, peeled himself off, and fell back onto his butt.

“You…son of a bitch!” cursed Naruto as brushed off his orange and black jacket; the fabric wet with his comrade’s perspiration. He glared up at Kiba; his eyes shaking in his head as they met Kiba’s amused ones. This was bad…Kiba was beginning to take advantage of him! He just knew this would happen! Naruto bit his lip as he watched Kiba point at his foot while wiggling his toes; it seemed he still wanted his foot sniffed. The shrunken jinchūriki’s mind raced to find some means of escaping this predicament: making a run for it, attacking Kiba, trying reason with him…none seemed likely to work. “F-Fine…” Naruto’s voice was full of reluctance as he temporarily gave into Kiba’s demand. He just hoped this was a one-time deal...or else he was in for a LOOOOONG trip home. The seated ninja watched through slit-like pupils as the mini Naruto approached his bare foot. The spiky-haired blond pressed himself against the flat, warm sole like it was a wall or something and gave it a long whiff. Immediately the Uzumaki’s face went pale and he started hacking and coughing. It was so foul! When Kiba had pressed him against it he had held his breath, but now that he was purposely smelling the foot…it reeked so bad! Naruto was truly thankful Kurama's presence didn't give him an enhanced, canine sense of smell like Kiba's. If it had...he'd probably be dead right now!

“How’s it smell?” Kiba asked innocently as he peered down at Naruto. Instead of answering him, Naruto continued to gag and nurse his burning nostrils. Narrowing his eyes, Kiba brought his other foot closer to the shrunken Leaf ninja once more and used a single toe to press the 16 year-old’s head against the ball of his foot. He smirked toothily as he heard Naruto’s squeaky complaints and felt him trying to push away from his mighty feet. For a while Kiba kept him like that; forcing the young Hokage wannabe to breathe in his rank foot odor. Eventually he drew his toe back and allowed Naruto to fall to the ground; covering his nose with both hands as tears dripped down his stinging eyes. “How’s. It. Smell?” Kiba asked once more as he threatened the smaller male by hanging his perspiring soles over his collapsed form.

“How do you think it smells?!” Naruto yelled back as he picked himself up onto his knees and used his orange sleeves to wipe sweat off his handsome mug. “It smells like you've been stepping in dog crap all day! I’ll ask again: when was the last time you washed those things?!” The young man suddenly pointed a finger at one of Kiba’s sandals. “And what about those?! I almost feel sorry for them…they must be rotten on the inside!”

“Geez, Naruto. I had no idea you were such a clean freak.” Kiba replied as he scratched the back of his brown-topped head. “If that’s the case…”

12321212.content:
"If that's the case, then why don't you clean 'em up?" Kiba asked, a slight smirk on his face. "What?! You must be joking Kiba! I'm the hero of our village, I saved it from Pain and the Akatsuki! I'm 100 more times stronger than you! Cleaning sandals is a slave's job, and I'm---" "You should look at your size before deciding whose job this is, Naruto." Kiba laughed as he interrupted the blond before he could finish. "You can't do this, Kiba! I thought you were my friend!" Naruto frowned as he looked at the towering Inuzuka.

"Whoa, hold on Naruto! I AM your friend... but can't a guy have some fun once in a while? Besides, before talking about friends, you'd best not forget that you were the one who hurt Akamaru!" Kiba replied. "You know that was an accident Kiba!" Naruto retaliated. "Look Naruto, I'm your friend, but that doesn't mean I can't boss ya a bit. If I wasn't your friend, I would've just stepped on you the moment I saw you like this!" Kiba said, as he crossed his legs. "Yeah, and you didn't, because you thought it would be much more profitable for your ego if you "boss me a bit" by making me your slave!" Naruto responded.

Kiba sighed before looking at the shrunken Naruto with a smirk. "Ok, you got me. I've always been in your shadow, like the rest of the rookies. But thing is, while the rest of the rookies accepted that, I never did! It always pissed me off, how you, the class clown who couldn't even make one clone, not only beat me during the chunin exams, but also became the village's hero! You got trained by a legendary sannin for three years, while I spent all that time training with Shino and Hinata. It's not that I regret it, but I mean... c'mon! THAT is so unfair!" Kiba complained. "Jeez Kiba, I knew you envied me, but this much?!" Naruto stared at the Inuzuka giant.

"Yeah, THIS much! And now with everything that happened... heh, well... it's like a dream come true for me! So Naruto..." Kiba spoke as he reached down for Naruto, grabbing him in his fist. Using his other hand, he grabbed one of his sandals and brought it closer to him. "Time for some sandal service!" Kiba chuckled as he gently placed Naruto on the sandal's opening. The small blond had to pinch his nose right after, as the terrible smell of Kiba's feet overcame him. "What are you waiting for, Naruto? Don't make me do something you really wouldn't like..." Kiba threatened. "H-How am I supposed to clean them?!!" Naruto asked. "Well, unless you know a good Water Style jutsu... I guess you should use your tongue..." Kiba laughed. Naruto grimaced, but he definitely didn't want Kiba to do "something he wouldn't like". But he still had to avoid being humiliated like this. As if luck was on his side, he noticed that Kiba had just started to rub his tired feet, and was too busy to look at him right now. The blond quickly used this moment to create a single shadow clone. Just as it appeared, he quickly managed to jump off the sandal, and hide behind the tree's side. "Wow, I can't believe I pulled that off! Now's my chance to escape!" Naruto thought, as he began to dash away.

His clone on the other hand was left with the unlucky task of obeying Kiba's orders and cleaning his sandal. "Ugh, this better be worth it..." the clone grimaced as he got on his knees and began to lick the insole of Kiba's sweaty sandal. The clone nearly threw up as it licked the sweat... as if that wasn't enough, there was also the powerful smell it had to endure. "Aaah, that's so much better!" Kiba relaxed as he rubbed his own feet. He returned his attention to the shrunken Naruto inside his sandal, who had began to work. "Yeah, lick it all up, Naruto! Don't forget you have another sandal to clean!" Kiba chuckled. "Hey, why don't you make some clones to help you? I'd be easier to do your job... I guess." Kiba chuckled again. "No, it's ok like this..." the clone responded among licks, fearful that Kiba might find out the truth. "That wasn't a suggestion, Naruto! I wanna see some clones... now!" Kiba ordered as he stomped his foot. The clone didn't respond.

"Hey, did you hear what I said?!" Kiba asked as he smashed his heel onto the opposite side of the sandal, tilting it and sending the clone flying in the air. "Damn!!" the clone muttered as it poofed away. Kiba stared dumbfounded. "What the---" he stood up and began to look around. "You think you can trick me?" Kiba spoke aloud. Using his sensitive nose, he began to sniff around for the tiny Naruto, but for some reason, he could hardly sense his smell. "Damn, there are all kinds of scents in this forest." Kiba cursed as he looked around. "The only distinct smell I can make out in here is that of my feet... hey, wait a second!" Kiba snapped his fingers. There was a really faint smell like that of his feet, but much weaker. Naruto had spent some time around them, so he had soaked some of the smell. Thinking fast and not even putting his sandals on, he began to follow the faint scent.

Because of his size, the shrunken fox boy hadn't gotten far. In fact, he had merely gotten just a few meters away. "Damn, that was way too quick!" the fox boy cursed, as he realized his shadow clone was already dispelled. It only took a couple of minutes, before Kiba noticed something orange running amid the green grass blades. It was easy to notice. "You're pretty fast for your size!" Kiba remarked as he quickly bent down and scooped the fleeing Naruto into his fist. "Ugh, let me go, Kiba!" the fox boy hissed as he was squeezed in Kiba's tight fist. "If you had just done your task, we would've gotten along, Naruto! But now you made me realize that I should mark you with my smell first..." Kiba spoke as he got back to his spot, next to the tree and his sandals. "Heh, I think you should spend some time in my own prison! That oughta teach ya a lesson!" Kiba laughed as he dropped the shrunken Naruto into the sandal his clone didn't clean. "Wait, you'll crush me...!" Naruto gulped as he saw Kiba beginning to insert his giant foot in. 12321212.title: Kiba makes Naruto clean his sandals.

Kiba arrives at a small town just outside the forest.
123212121.content:
When Naruto saw that huge, bare foot of Kiba’s enter the black sandal, the young Uzumaki was gaping up at it while lying on his back. It was only when his thick, muscular toes passed over him that Naruto snapped out of his daze.

“N-No…!” Naruto blurted out as he rolled onto his stomach and tried to crawl out toward the sandal’s front opening. His bright, blue eyes were wide with the fear of being crushed like a bug in his friend’s sandal. It was too late for an escape attempt, however; before the blond could move a centimeter toward freedom, Kiba’s warm foot fitted into the sandal completely and his shrunken form was sealed between the sweaty rubber of the sandal and the equally sweaty sole of the giant’s foot.

“Hehe…I can’t believe I have you in my sandal.” Kiba mumbled as he flexed and curled his toes with content. “This is awesome.” The larger shinobi licked his lips as he felt Naruto squirm for dear life under the ball of his foot. He felt just like an unlucky cockroach in the wrong place at the wrong time. Normally, this would be the part where he crushed the gross, foreign life form in his footwear, however…

“U-Ugh…not like this…! I can’t…die here!” Naruto grunted as he squirmed and writhed in this smelly, hot, limited space. His handsome face was on its side and being squeezed into a goofy expression against his will. No matter how much strength he put into his struggles, he had no hope of moving the mountain that was Kiba Inuzuka. Naruto tried calming down and breathing and realized something. Kiba was standing on him…pressing down on him like everyone’s feet pressed down on the Earth…and he was still alive. Naruto dug his nails into the baked skin of the dog ninja’s sole and pushed. To his surprise, it wasn’t like a big boulder or a brick wall…Kiba’s soft flesh was actually pushed away a few millimeters from his face. The young giant’s foot was a lot more malleable than he was expecting!

“I wonder what all the guys back home would think if I told them our future Hokage almost pissed himself.” Kiba taunted from above; directing a smirk down at his foot he knew the blond couldn’t see.

“S-Shut up!” Naruto shouted as he struck the thick, wet skin above him with a coiled fist. “I wasn’t scared, mutt!”

“Oh please. I could smell your fear from up here, runt.”

“…okay…well I wasn’t <i>that</i> scared! Now let me out right now, Kiba!!”

“Pfft, no way.” was the brown-haired chūnin’s response as he started walking; his other sandal comfortably on his other foot. As he raised his foot into the air, Naruto felt like the world was moving before Kiba’s sandal touched the grassy ground. Blades of green were mashed under his trends and Naruto was mashed underneath his sweaty sole; pain coursing through his body as the flesh of Kiba’s foot momentarily molded around his tiny form. It only lasted a second before the foot was lifted back into the air…and came back down a second later. “You’re staying in there until you’re marked with my scent. Hehe…I’m gonna turn your natural smell into my foot odor, Naruto! Then you’ll never be able to escape me!”

“No…ugh…way…!” Naruto grunted between strides as Kiba pounded him underfoot with each step he took. Kiba couldn’t seriously be planning on changing his natural body odor, could he?! That was impossible…he was just joking or exaggerating! Or being plain dumb! No matter how much of the mutt’s rank foot sweat soaked through his clothes…no matter how much his warm sole brushed against his body…it’s nothing a long bath couldn’t fix! …right?

“Let’s see…I’m pretty sure this way will get us out of this forest and into a nearby town.” Kiba spoke to himself as he strolled south through the dense woods. Looking up at the sky, Kiba guessed the sun would be going down in a few more hours. If he didn’t get out of here before then, the two of them would have to spend the night beneath the trees. The teenager grimaced as he touched his abdominals hidden beneath his black jacket. “I really hope we reach the town before nightfall. I could go for a nice, hot meal and a warm bed…” Kiba’s slit-like pupils glanced at his pocket where he was keeping some of their rations. “Even beef jerky gets boring after a while.”
123212121.title: Naruto is imprisoned in Kiba's sandal

choices: Kiba has a good time using his feet to trample and crush the tiny Sage Naruto
Kiba decides to tape the tiny Sage Naruto to the bottom of his foot instead
1232121212.content:
"Ugh, I hope I find the town before the sun sets. I'm seriously hungry..." Kiba remarked as he patted his jacket-covered abdominals. Inside his sweaty sandal, the shrunken Naruto felt like he was about to be flattened under Kiba's sweaty sole. "Ugh, l-let me, ou--" the tiny Uzumaki couldn't finish as the sole lowered on him once again, pressing him into the insole of Kiba's sandal. Naruto felt like he was about to throw up, the smell was terrible, it was sweaty and tight in the sandal. He could feel his lips being pressed into the bottom Kiba's foot, tasting a salty and sweaty taste. As if that wasn't enough, the fact that Kiba was literally walking on him was having a devastating effect on Naruto's ego.

"I'm the village's hero, and here I am about to get crushed under Kiba's foot... of all the people, I can't believe I'm losing to him! That mutt... if I was my normal size, I'd crush him... but like this.....!!" Naruto cursed in his thoughts as Kiba continued to stomp on him.

It wasn't long before Kiba finally made it to a nearby town. The walking was actually less than the distance he had walked during the entire day before his rest, but all of it was worth it, as he noticed a small dango-like shop. "Eh, I really wanted something more... meaty, but I guess I'll have to settle with dango for now..." the young Inuzuka member shrugged as he walked up to it. Having ordered a dango, Kiba briefly sat on a bench to consume it. Inside his sandal confinement, Naruto felt the pressure on him begin to lessen as Kiba sat down. The pressure was reduced enough, so he could actually move a bit. Doing his best, the shrunken fox boy managed to slide himself along the sandal towards the opening. "Hehe, I dunno what you're doing in there, but it tickles..." Kiba snickered as he ate his dango.

"Ahg, this is as further as I can go..." Naruto remarked as he slid underneath Kiba's toes, which were now lightly pressing down on his whiskered face. "H-help!!" the young fox boy screamed, as he managed to poke his arm outside. "Wha---" Kiba nearly spew out what he ate, as he heard Naruto and saw a tiny arm poking out between his toes. Reacting quickly, the Inuzuka member quickly looked around, before taking care of the problem. Naruto felt the pressure on him increase more than ever, as Kiba clenched his toes, and used them to row the shrunken Naruto back inside the sandal. Naruto grimaced, as Kiba once again pressed his giant sole down on him, but Naruto wasn't about to give up as he attemped to force his position back to how it was. "Oh no you don't!" Kiba frowned, as he began to gently twist his foot into the sandal. He was careful not to crush the little Uzumaki, as he pressed down. "Ack!!" Naruto squaked, as he felt his tiny body start to compress underneath Kiba's smelly foot. The pressure that Kiba's giant foot applied on his small head was too much, and he lost consciousness.

At that moment, Kiba felt the tiny Naruto under his foot become limp. He couldn't help but give his lips a quick lick as he supressed the Leaf's hero. "Dang, I can't believe I'm actually doing this to him. I never thought that jutsus which can reduce an opponent's size could be so effective! I'm definitely going to develop a jutsu like this myself when I get back to the village, heheh..." Kiba snickered as he finished eating his dango. "Well, time to go get a room for the night!" Kiba announced as he stood up, and began walking towards the nearest inn.

=================================================

Closing the door behind him, Kiba settled himself into the room where he was going to spend the night. "I can finally take a seat!" Kiba sighed as he sat on the bed, the mattress creaking underneath his weight. Bending down, he began to take off his sandals. "Aaah, that's the stuff!" Kiba sighed in delight as the powerful smell hat his tired feet emanated began to drift across the room. "Where is---" Kiba began to wonder as he didn't see Naruto in his sandal, but that wonder was quickly ceazed as he noticed the shrunken fox boy pressed into his sole. Kiba grinned, as he used two fingers to pluck the shrunken Naruto out of his sole and gently set him down on the ground. It was at that point, that the young fox boy began to regain consciousness. "Ugh, what is this terrible smell... and why is it so bright?" Naruto asked, still dazed. It didn't take long however, before he quickly remembered the situation he was in. He grit his teeth, as he noticed a giant Kiba grinning down at him. "Ugh, I stink like your freaking feet, Kiba!!" Naruto should out in anger, as he grimaced. "The smell is probably going to last for a few days! Just until I have to put you in my sandal again~" Kiba laughed, pleased with the results of his "marking". "Where the hell are we?!" the furious Naruto asked.

"Whoa, calm down, Naruto. It's not like I ate your ramen... anyways, we're in a inn that we're going to spend the night at." Kiba explained. "Good, then this is the perfect place where I can crush you!" Naruto barked back. "By the way, I decided that I'm going to keep you like this. With you out of the way, I can finally become Hokage!" Kiba grinned. "No, no, no!! I'm SO much stronger than you, you have absolutely no chance against me!!" Naruto shook his head in anger. "Oh yeah, how DID you beat Pain by the way? I heard you learned something new, but I have no idea what exactly..." Kiba pondered, ignoring Naruto's claims. "Yeah, after everything you did, I'm SO going to use Sage Mode on you!" Naruto stated as he sat down, crossing his legs, and starting to gather natural energy. "Uh... Sage Mode? What the hell is that...?" Kiba asked.

It wasn't long before Naruto stood up, and opened his eyes, revealing an orange shade around them, along with froggy-golden eyes. "What the... is that some sort of visual jutsu?!" Kiba asked, getting more confused by the second. "You stupid mutt! In Sage Mode, my strength is far greater, as well as my stamina!! I lifted one of Pain's rhinos with ease, and my body is almost as hard as steel! I fell off a cliff like this, and even though it hurt, I was all right!" Naruto explained. "Wait, wait a second! So... you mean to say, that while you're like this, you can endure anything?" Kiba asked. "Yeah, and even at this size, I'll still kick your ass!!" Naruto replied back. "So I can crush you... without actually crushing you? Without you dying?" Kiba asked again. "If my body is hard as steel, then what the hell do you think it means?!" Naruto retaliated. "It means... that I'm finally going to get the chance to defeat you, plus take the Hokage title for myself! And it also means that I'm going to have a good time crushing you under my big feet... in all sorts of ways~" Kiba laughed as he stood up to his full height, the tiny Sage Naruto being as tall as his... ankle. The towering Kiba loomed over the shrunken sage. "We're going to battle for the Hokage title and I'm going to use my feet to squash you flat!" Kiba grinned.

Naruto took a slight step back, as he looked up at the grinning giant Inuzuka, Kiba's large feet booming across the wooden floor. "I-I'm going to be the Hokage, and I'll never give up!!" the shrunken Naruto stated his resolve. "Hehehheheh, you'll give up alright..." Kiba licked his lips as he grinned down maliciously at his tiny opponent.

12321212121.content:
As the dog boy was threateningly heading towards the Naruto, he prepared with all his might to face him, quickly concentrated his Sage Mode to form a protective shield around his body. He was not intimidated by the heavy stamping that the Inuzuka boy was doing over the wooden floor and remained calm once his huge feet slammed on both sides of his body.

“All right runt! So, you think your Toad Mode will save you from me, huh? Well, now you'll face my feet to find out, you pesky bug!” Kiba shouted as he lifted his right foot, placed it on the tiny boy and began to bring it down on him. Naruto immediately raised his arms, held the foot and kept it from falling down over him. Kiba pushed his foot harder, but seeing that Naruto was holding it with his hands, he said: “Nice try, Naruto, but do you really think that'll stop me?” “Of course! and as soon as I'm free I'm going to knock you out, Kiba!” The Uzumaki boy replied with absolute confidence, Kiba grumbled slightly, but recovered and said threateningly: “Do you really think you can hit me? Oh, come on! Before you can even do a jutsu, I'll have you under my feet!” Then Kiba had an idea and started moving his other foot towards Naruto.

Naruto was using all his strength to get rid of Kiba’s foot, the thought of being crushed by the dog boy's sweaty sole made him sick, especially as he imagined what Kiba might do to him afterwards. So he kept trying to lift his foot to slip away, when suddenly something hit him in the back, Naruto turned to see what happened and found nothing less than the huge toes of Kiba’s other foot, which kicked him again and made him lose his concentration, something that the boy dog took advantage of to plunge his right foot against him, which caused his arms to wobble due to the pressure. Worried to see that Kiba’s foot had descended further towards him, Naruto tried to raise his arms again but another kick from the left toes stopped him.

“I got you, runt!” chuckled the dog boy. “I just have to use my toes to knock you down and your ridiculous Toad Mode will be smashed under my foot, but I don't think you want that, so I'll make you a proposal: All you have to do is massage my feet for a while and in return I'll leave you alone the whole night.” he said as he bent his foot until his toes brushed against Naruto’s face. “So what do you say, buddy? Do you want to start with my left foot or do you prefer the right one?” Kiba asked, waiting for the answer. Annoyed by this, Naruto used his right arm to hit the big toes that were holding him down. “None of them, you idiot! I'll never do anything as disgusting as rubbing your filthy feet, mutt!” He replied as he tried to remove the toes that were clutching his body. “What a shame runt, you asked for it, now you'll feel the power of my mighty feet over your puny little body!” The Inuzuka boy said with a wicked smirk.

From that point, Naruto began to be attacked by the Kiba’s left toes, which began to pull him sideways. Knowing he'd try to take him down with them, he hurried to hold the right foot back with both arms, but as soon as he had done it, the strong toes released his body and struck him on the back again, causing his arms to wobble and the huge sole of the right foot slumped further over him. This was not compared to the previous enemies that the boy had faced before, because in addition to its large size, Kiba’s heavy feet were coordinating themselves in order to crush him; Something that should be very funny for the boy dog, but for him meant a humiliating torture he had never faced before. All this went through Naruto’s mind as he confronted two rivals: The massive sole that threw all its weight into his arms and the big toes that kicked him over and over looking for his weakest point. Finally, after a while of struggling, Naruto reached his limit and as soon as the toes kicked him again, his arms collapsed, the huge sole knocked him down and as soon as he fell on the floor, Kiba took advantage and put both feet together. “At last I brought down this fool! Let’s see if he wants to fight back.” Kiba thought as he sat down on his bed anxious to see Naruto’s reaction.

After a few moments, Naruto recovered from Kiba’s footfall and saw with horror that he was in the middle of his feet. After pinching his nose to avoid the stench as much as possible, he looked for an escape route and when he saw a little light at one end he began to crawl there, unaware that Kiba could feel it moving underneath him, when he got to where the light was he began to crawl out, but when he was halfway out something heavy knocked him down and kept him from moving forward.

“Where do you think you're going, Naruto? I've barely had any fun with you.” Kiba said as he held the little ninja pinned under his toes.

“Do you think I'm your toy? Naruto replied by turning red in anger and trying to keep crawling out of the Inuzuka boy's feet. “I have trained more than you, I am a better ninja than you and even with this size I can beat you!”

“You're brave Naruto, but I think you still don't know your place, maybe a little pressure will clear your head!” The dog boy replied and clenched his toes against Naruto’s body to drag him back under his feet. Naruto tried to resist but Kiba’s muscular toes were too strong and after several bumps they dropped in front of his head and squeezed together so that the boy couldn't escape. Soon the Uzumaki boy began to be overwhelmed by the stench of Kiba’s feet, which seemed to have increased in the last few minutes, and that's when he announced:

“Welcome to my torture chamber, Naruto! Now that I have you trapped you have two choices, either give me a good massage or you will be tortured by my powerful feet, and I assure you that being crushed is not the only way I can torture you buddy. So, what do you say, runt?” Kiba finished as he began rubbing his sweaty soles against Naruto’s body.

123212121211.content:
Naruto only had a few seconds to think. If he refused to cooperate, Kiba would squeeze his toes against him and could hurt him. The best thing he could do was to agree with the stubborn ninja and once he left him alone, he could look for a chance to escape. He disliked the idea of being forced to lick his feet, but it was definitely better than being crushed among them.

“Fine Kiba, you win. I’ll lick your feet!” The Uzumaki boy finally said.

“Well, you finally understood where you belong!” Kiba replied proud of himself as he released the mini ninja. “And now, get to work!” He finished by sitting on the floor and dropping his two feet right in front of him.

Naruto approached one of the huge masses in front of him and began to lick it from the bottom up. The taste was disgusting, due to the excess sweat that had gathered over the skin and there was some grime built up amid the wrinkles of the foot. However, the tiny ninja kept licking the foot to prevent the giant from crushing him. Once he finished with the heel and began to lick the arch, Kiba told him:

“Now I want you to get in between my toes!” And after pressing his other foot against Naruto, he pushed him up to the height of his toes. “Clean them up completely!”

The space between the giant's toes was gross, there was a lot of crud gathered in that space and the stench was so bad that even with his nose covered, Naruto started to get dizzy. But as he was being held under the toes of the other foot, he had no choice but to get in the middle of each of the toes and clean them. “At least he didn't tell me to lick this!” The poor ninja thought as he picked up the crud with his hands and threw it away. After several minutes he finished and once Kiba noticed his work, he picked up Naruto with his hand.

“All right Naruto, that’s enough for today! Tomorrow you’ll continue with my other foot.” He said on his way to bed, but instead of tossing him there, he opened a drawer on the nightstand.

“Hey, what are you doing? You said you'd let me sleep!”

“Take it easy, buddy. I just want to ensure you don't run away from me!” Kiba said, putting a pillow inside the drawer and after throwing Naruto as well, he closed it and set a chair next to the nightstand to jam it.

“I've never felt so good as today, I can't wait to keep teasing this puny kid. Tomorrow I’ll think of more ideas to torment him just in case he doesn't want to obey me, but for now I'd like to take a break!” It was the last thought of the Inuzuka boy before falling asleep, confident that tomorrow he would have the fox boy at his service for another day of enjoyment.

He hands reached down and snatched Naruto up. His eyes looking him over as the Sage thrashed about. Keep reached into his first bag and pulled out a the gauze. Naruto started to squirm more, not sure what Kiba was going to show him who was strongest in the village regardless of size. Ha.” Like that he was out the door.

His foot was going overtime on sweat this time drenching him and the bandage holding him there in sweat. The smell was over powering. The rank smell in concert with the rhythm of stomping was making him woozy. He tried to yell for Kiba to let up but all that did was get his mouth pushed against the sole, giving him a mouth full of disgusting foot sweat. His head was in a daze, and his nostril burned. Kiba could feel the movement slowing, knowing he had won this show of dominance.

It was only a half hour of punishment but Naruto was on the fringes of consciousness. Kiba took off his sandal unwrapping the bandage looking at Naruto. “How did you like that?” He took a sniff, the twerp and his feet were nearly indistinguishable this would do until he could permanently mark him, he would reek for a while. Naruto looked daze as he made eye contact with Kiba’s giant face. “What…no I don’t want any more Ramen too salty.” Naruto mumbled. It got Kiba to snicker and replace the bandage. The great sage could sleep there on his foot overnight. Kiba got ready for bed and laid down as Naruto eventually lost his battle with consciousness.

After a few hours Naruto woke up and found himself still wrapped in the middle of Kiba's foot, remembering the events of the previous day he decided that the Inuzuka boy wasn't reliable anymore, if he stayed with Kiba he would continue to torture him with his feet until left him permanently marked by his stench or seriously wounded. The best thing would be to escape from him and find a way to reach the village by himself, Naruto began to move his arms and managed to free them from the bandages, which had loosened during the night, he began to search through his clothes until he found one of his sharpened-tipped kunai’s.

"Perfect, now I just have to be careful that Kiba doesn't catch me running away." Naruto thought and began to cut the bandages in front of him very carefully, fortunately the fabric wasn't hard to break and gradually the boy made his way through the layers of bandage. After making an opening large enough to fit through, Naruto crawled slowly through it and began to slide out of Kiba's foot, suddenly he felt a shake and freaked out thinking that the dog boy was waking up, but it was only his foot that tilted to the side, which helped Naruto as it rested right over the surface of the bed.

Once Naruto fell on the bed he went to the nearest edge, looked around the room for an exit and found a sliding door a few steps from him. He used the bed sheet as a support to climb down and when he reached the floor he made his way to the door, taking care not to make any noise while walking on the wooden floor and looking back every few steps to make sure Kiba was still asleep. After a while he managed to get to the door, slid it just enough to fit in and walked out to an outside corridor adjacent to a small forest.

"Wow, this is better than I expected, what kind of place is this?" Naruto wondered when he saw the little forest in front of him: It had dense vegetation composed mostly of dense trees and some fruit plants, a lagoon with a waterfall, some mounds of earth here and there and even some benches for guests. Because he hadn't eaten since the day before and seeing that the sun hadn't risen yet, Naruto thought it would be best to eat something to regain strength, take a bath in the little lake and then leave. The mini ninja walked through the bushes looking for food, soon discovered several fruits scattered on the ground, so he began to eat them very happily until he was satisfied.

After resting for a while to let his body process everything he had eaten, Naruto made his way to the small lake, when he reached the shore he put his hand in the water and when he felt that it was at a pleasant temperature he threw himself into the lake with his clothes on to get rid of Kiba's sweat. After a quick dip, Naruto took off his clothes, left them hanging on some branches to let them dry and returned to the lake to swim for a while and clean himself. He was so calm floating on the warm water and surrounded by the soothing sounds of the little forest that he didn't realize that the sun was starting to rise on the horizon.

=================================================

Inside a nearby room Kiba was starting to wake up, he had had a completely satisfying night, because after several days of exhausting research, he had finally found the plant he needed to cure his dog and besides that Naruto had become his personal slave, although he had been through a couple of casualties, that had not affected him at all, for now he was only thinking of returning to the Leaf Village and keep taking revenge on his new toy along the way.

“Good morning, Naruto. How was your night in there?” Kiba said thinking that a lot of the runt's complaints and insults would reach his ears, yet there was no response. Believing that Naruto was still asleep, he began to shake his foot to wake him up. “Get up now or you'll start the day sandwiched between my feet!” The Inuzuka boy threatened.

“HEY! ARE YOU LISTENING TO ME, YOU USELESS PIECE OF...?” Kiba shouted as he looked at his right foot and discovered with horror that the Uzumaki boy had escaped from his sole. Clearly pissed off, he started looking for him all over the room, peeked under the bed, shuffled around the nightstand drawers and even went into the closet to make sure he wasn't hiding there.

Not finding the mini ninja he sat down on the now messy bed and began to look carefully around the room. “Damn, for some reason I can't smell him, where has this bastard gone?” Kiba thought worried, then he heard a faint sound of water and in searching for its source he found out the small gap in the sliding door, stuck his nose in and after sniffing a bit he got the unmistakable trace of Naruto. “I got you now, Naruto. Soon I'll make you pay for trying to run away from me.” Kiba said greedily as he put his sandals back on, then opened the door and stepped out to catch him.

Naruto was still resting in the pond when he heard Kiba’s loud screaming, quickly got out of the water and grabbed his clothes, they were still wet but the fox boy didn't care. He had to get dressed and run when otherwise he would be caught by the giant ninja and he would torture him even more for escaping from his foot. Once dressed, Naruto hurried into the forest, hoping to get away from the dog boy.

Kiba stepped out of the room and looked around, not finding Naruto he sniffed around and within seconds he found his faint scent just a short distance from him, so he stepped on the grass and began stepping towards him.

“I got you, Naruto! You’ll pay for running away from me!” Kiba shouted, stomping heavily on the ground and causing his big sandals to fill with mud and debris at every step. However, this didn't matter to the giant boy, he wanted to catch Naruto as soon as possible, so he began to walk faster and soon he saw a well-known orange jacket moving through the grass in the backyard.

Naruto saw Kiba’s huge black sandals stomping towards him and fearing to be crushed beneath their rubbery soles he began to seek a hideout. Near him he saw a small cave where he could get into and he ran with all his strength to get to the entrance, barely managed to get into the cave in time but unfortunately the Inuzuka boy could see him getting in there.

“So now you're hiding from me, huh?” Kiba said as he bent down and stuck his hand in the cave to capture Naruto, who at the sight of the huge hand coming in decided to step further into the cave to avoid getting caught. The Inuzuka boy stuck his whole arm in, but he couldn’t close his fingers around Naruto, who was only inches away from him. “Well, so you'd rather run away from me than fight, Naruto. What a wimpy ninja you have become!” The giant boy teased hoping to make Naruto came out on his own.

“You’ll see what I'm made of, filthy mutt!” Naruto said upset and after several hand movements, he made a Rasenshuriken and tossed it to the cave entrance where it collided with the open hand of the Inuzuka boy, who immediately felt severe pain and had to pull his arm out of the cave.

“You’ll pay for this, jerk!” Kiba shouted as he saw his hand burned by Naruto’s attack, he was very pissed. “I'll make sure you can't escape me, you'll see!”

Naruto thought that after his attack Kiba wouldn’t try to attack him again, but he was very wrong. The giant boy was pondering about how to force him out of the cave, but he couldn't figure out anything good, he got pissed off and in a burst of rage he kicked the mountain where the cave was. Since Kiba had his sandals on he didn't hurt his foot, in fact when he saw the dirt that his sandal had torn off, he discovered that the small mountain wasn’t very tough, a few strong kicks would be enough to knock it down, so with a smirk on his face he got ready for the attack.

“You better get ready for this, Naruto! Because I'm coming for you!” Kiba said and started kicking the cave repeatedly. Naruto worried, as with every kick the Inuzuka boy gave the entire cave began to shatter and dirt fell on him. “You decide Naruto, get out right now or you'll be trapped inside the cave!” Kiba threatened as he kept smashing the mountain the mini ninja was on with his sandals.

12321212122111.content:
Naruto was frightened, he had backed off until he bumped against the bottom of the cave, which kept shaking violently because of the ramming that the Inuzuka boy's sandals were were giving it. Every time Kiba kicked the mountain his huge sandal was getting deeper into the cave, taking a good amount of ground with it and Naruto could see how the boy's thick toes were getting closer and closer to him. If he didn't get out of there he would be caught by them, so when he saw that Kiba took his sandal out from the cave to get ready for another kick, Naruto took the chance and rushed out. But he wasn't fast enough to escape Kiba, who saw him coming out and quickly trapped him in his fist.

"I've got you, you idiot! You thought you could get away from me, huh? Well, now you'll pay for that!"

Kiba hurried back to his room, relieved that no one had seen him or Naruto during his escape attempt. Once inside, he sat down on the floor with both of his sandals on, he intended to use them to give the stubborn ninja a lesson he would never forget.

"Let me out Kiba!" Naruto said as he tried to free himself from the tight fist when suddenly the big hand opened. Nato fell a bit but before he reached the ground his right leg was grabbed by the fingers of the giant boy, who was looking at him with an evil grimace.

“So, you think you're smart, don’t you? You think I can’t beat you, huh? Well… Let me tell you that you’re wrong! I’ve smashed rocks bigger than you and you won’t be the exception, Naruto!” Kiba said as he positioned his sandals just below Naruto so that he could crush him between his outsoles once he released his leg. “So, get ready, tough guy! I'll give you a lesson so you can see who is the strongest ninja in the village!"

“Go ahead, big mutt! You won't scare me!” Naruto cried out proudly. "Fine idiot! I’m gonna have a lot of fun with you!” Kiba shouted and as he released the mini ninja's leg, he began to push his sandaled feet together. Naruto rushed to gather energy from his Sage Mode around him to make a shield. Once the soles of his two sandals bumped against each other Kiba pressed his feet a bit tighter so there would be no gaps between them and Naruto got imprisoned within the bottoms of his huge sandals.

“That's how you're gonna beat me? Come on Kiba! you haven't even tickled me!” Naruto said mockingly. “Oh, really? Then you won't mind getting this!” Kiba threatened and began rubbing his sandals together, causing the treads from both soles to slam into Naruto’s body. At first this didn't affect the mini ninja; his Sage Mode shield absorbed all the beating from the Inuzuka boy's sandals and his body only rolled back and forth across its surface. But after a while Kiba began scrubbing his sandals with more pressure and this caused Naruto’s shield to crack. “Oh no! My Sage Mode is running out! I must get out of here or I’ll be crushed!” Naruto thought worried.

Kiba was in heaven, having the opportunity to crush Naruto with nothing less than his own feet was exciting him and once he sniffed the tiny boy's fear, a bulge began to grow in his crotch. "Hehe! This was a great idea! The fool thought he would have a chance against me. I just have to wait for my sandals to beat him up and he'll end up surrendering to me!" Kiba thought as he kept scrubbing the soles of his two sandals against the mini ninja, after a few minutes he decided to rest, but kept his feet pressed together to keep Naruto trapped within their sandaled bottoms.

Naruto thought Kiba had fallen asleep and decided to take the opportunity to escape from his stinky sandals. “Just wait for me to get out of here, mutt!” You're gonna pay for everything you did to me, I swear!” The Uzumaki boy thought as he was crawling through the tight space among Kiba’s massive sandals and looking for a way out, almost everything around him was blocked by the pressed treads from the edges of the two bottoms but in front of him he saw a gap big enough to pass through, so he headed there. What the Uzumaki boy didn't know, however, was that the giant boy had left that gap on purpose. With his powerful sense of smell he knew that the tiny ninja was crawling through his sandals to escape from them, so he decided to take care of him.

Naruto was about to reach the front gap to escape when he noticed that Kiba’s massive sandals were squeezing back together. Scared of getting trapped he tried to rush in, but Kiba’s hefty feet were faster and the gap was sealed between the rubber treads from both sandals as they pressed against each other. “Were you going somewhere, Naruto? I don't think so!” The dog boy threatened with a smirk and started scrubbing his huge sandals against Naruto, putting a lot of his strength upon his two feet to crush him. Naruto attempted to scream but the middle treads from the huge outsole smashed against his face, muffling his claims beneath its tough, rubbery surface.

“Sorry, did you say something? I couldn't hear you, bug boy! Your pathetic struggles make me think you still want to fight, so… How about a fight against my sandals, Naruto? Let’s see how good you are at facing just them!”

“You haven't beaten me yet, you mutt! I’m gonna kick your ass, Ki…” Naruto shouted in rage as he tried to make his way through the tight space in which he was trapped, but the rubbery treads from the two sandals began grinding his body harder. Naruto’s shield could barely withstand the huge pressure applied on it, but Kiba wasn't satisfied yet. He wanted to wreck the Sage Shield once and for all so he tried a tough method: He split the soles of his sandals a bit from the Uzumaki boy but then he smashed them back against the mini ninja before he had a chance to escape.

Naruto got very dazed, the strong thud from the hard surface of Kiba’s heavy sandals had taken him out of control and his Sage Mode shield kept breaking. The frightened boy kept looking for a way to break through but no matter where he moved, everything around him was blocked by the clenched treads from the edges of Kiba’s massive sandals, who had fun playing with his mighty feet to keep the mini ninja trapped between its thick outsoles. If Naruto tried to move ahead, Kiba pressed his toes so that the tips of his sandals would crush him before he could escape, and if he tried to escape from the back, the giant boy squeezed his heels together to grind him with his back treads. But Kiba still didn't have enough, so he started scrubbing both of his feet against Naruto and his sandals tortured him in several ways: The thick outsoles took care of dragging him from one end to the other, gluing him onto its rubbery surface. The treads from the middle of his soles beat down on his body, filling it with all the filth that Kiba had crushed during his walk and the repeated beating from his feet kept increasing, causing Naruto to lose his concentration.

After several minutes of torturing the mini ninja with both of his sandals, Kiba heard a cracking sound, so he finally decided to pull his sandals apart and when he saw that Naruto’s orange wave had disappeared, he knew that he had succeeded in breaking his Sage Mode. He let the weakened boy sit on the floor and after standing up he proudly spoke to him:

“You're pathetic, Naruto! Did you really think you had the strength to beat me? You couldn't even handle my sandals, so from now on you'll recognize that I'll be the new Hokage! Kiba said with a proud grin as he looked down at his defeated rival.
